label: OneHourCleveland
name: 1hrcleveland
description: Welcome to One Hour Heating & Air Conditioning, your source for prompt, courteous, reliable heating and air service. Offering heating and air conditioning maintenance, installation, repairs, and everything in between, our goal is to address your HVAC needs in a timely, efficient, and cost-effective fashion. If you are located in Cleveland, heating and air systems need to be kept in good shape in your home if you want to stay comfortable. If you want to remain cool during summer and warm during winter while staying within your budget, you should give One Hour Heating & Air Conditioning a chance to perform repairs.

comments.comment: 'I am bound to Tahiti for more men.' 'Very good. Let me board you a moment I come in peace.' With that he leaped from the canoe, swam to the boat; and climbing the gunwale, stood face to face with the captain. 'Cross your arms, sir; throw back your head. Now, repeat after me. As soon as Steelkilt leaves me, I swear to beach this boat on yonder island, and remain there six days. If I do not, may lightning strike me!'A pretty scholar,' laughed the Lakeman. 'Adios, Senor!' and leaping into the sea, he swam back to his comrades.
comments.title: Revolution has begun!

comments.comment: 'I am bound to Tahiti for more men.' 'Very good. Let me board you a moment I come in peace.' With that he leaped from the canoe, swam to the boat; and climbing the gunwale, stood face to face with the captain. 'Cross your arms, sir; throw back your head. Now, repeat after me. As soon as Steelkilt leaves me, I swear to beach this boat on yonder island, and remain there six days. If I do not, may lightning strike me!'A pretty scholar,' laughed the Lakeman. 'Adios, Senor!' and leaping into the sea, he swam back to his comrades.
comments.title: I can't Believe it!
